member.name: T:Warcraft.IStorageRepo
member.summary: Stores all saved games and highscore. Can save games, and reload them.

member.name: M:Warcraft.IStorageRepo.Save(Warcraft.IGameModel,System.String)
member.summary: Saves a game state to a file.

member.name: M:Warcraft.IStorageRepo.Load(System.String)
member.param: File name where the game is saved.

member.name: M:Warcraft.IStorageRepo.GetHighScores
member.summary: Gives the high scores in a descending order.
